titles.title: A resolution congratulating "A Prairie Home Companion" on its 40 years of engaging, humorous, and quality radio programming.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/26/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the cast and crew of A Prairie Home Companion for 40 years of radio programming and recognizes Minnesota Public Radio and American Public Media for bringing such program into millions of homes.
